name: Zack Gray - Don't Take Your Love

metadata.description:
"Don't Take Your Love" was released on May 22, 2020, roughly two months after "15 days to slow the spread". It was my last release of 2020 and my final solo/pop track before fully entering the EDM space in 2021. 

The song first came to life while I was messing with a vocal plugin I recently purchased and experimenting with stacking a lot of vocals together to make a choir/gang vocal. The line that started that experiment was, "No, don't take your love from me." 

The lyrics were inspired by a relationship on the verge of collapse, and the feelings of experiencing someone's love slowly fade. It's interesting and kind of poetic, though, that the song lyrics are beautifully and tragically paralleled with the love of the world gradually being replaced by fear. So I'd say "Don't Take Your Love" is also a song about the desperate plea to not lose love in the world during one of the most extraordinary times of our lives. 

"Don't Take Your Love" is one of the few songs in my career that is 100% written, recorded, produced, mixed, and mastered entirely by myself. This style of song is the kind of music I want to return to making in the future. 

This Music NFT release with Sound is a brand new endeavor for me in the Web3 space, so a massive thank you to them for reaching out and another huge thank you to everyone who mints this song. 

From the bottom of my heart, it really does mean the world to me when anyone finds a connection with something I've created. 

Much Love and God bless, 

Zack Gray

lyrics.text:
Don’t Take Your Love by Zack Gray 

BPM 150 to 140 [Bridge]
Key E Major / C# Minor

[Chorus]
No
Don't take your love from me (No)
Don't take your love from me (No)
Don't take your love from me (No)
Don't take your love from me (No)
Don't take your love from me (No)
Don't take your love from me

[Verse 1]
I've been watching you change
And I don't think it's a phase
Just tell me what I can do now
'Cause I don't want this to end up the same
No baby

[Chorus]
No
Don't take your love from me (No)
Don't take your love from me (No)
Don't take your love from me (No)
Don't take your love from me 

[Verse 2]
Baby tell me where your head's at
You know I'm sorry when you ask mе
No I cannot pretend
Not again
But I don't wanna hold on
If you can't take it anymorе
So far from the usual, yeah

[Chorus]
No
Don't take your love from me (No)
Don't take your love from me (No)
Don't take your love from me (No)
Don't take your love from me (No)
Don't take your love from me (No)
Don't take your love from me (No)
Don't take your love from me (No)
Don't take your love from me

[Bridge]
So come back and stay
Come back and talk
Bare your arms around me
Don't go leaving out the door
So why don't you wait
Bring back your heart
Tell me that you need me baby
Tell me that I'm yours

[Outro]
Don't take your love from me
Don't take your love
Don't take your love from me
Don't take your love

Don't take your love from me
Don't take your love
Don't take your love from me
Don't take your love
